[h1][b]Introduction[/b][/h1] [h1]------------------------------------------[/h1] The Rogue Knight is a class mod based on Dota 2's Sven. This mod includes a hero with custom sprites, four palettes, a unique skillset based on his Dota 2 abilities, ten trinkets, and over 500 custom dialogue lines. He is a frontline melee combatant filling a similar role to the Leper, though with more utility and ability to support his teammates.

[h1][b]Other Information[/b][/h1] [h1]------------------------------------------[/h1] [list] [*]The Rogue Knight's canon name is Sven. [*]The Rogue Knight is not religious. [*]The Rogue Knight uses the Outsider's Bonfire district. [*]On crit, the Rogue Knight gains +20% DMG until the end of his next turn. [*]This mod comes with 10 class trinkets for the Rogue Knight: 2 common, 3 uncommon, 1 rare, 1 very rare, 2 Crimson Court and 1 Color of Madness trinket. Trinket images and stats are in the teaser images above. [*]This mod is compatible with the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1779509342]Pets mod[/url], which adds Almond the Frondillo as a pet for him. [*]The Rogue Knight has 30 party names included for various compositions. [*]The Rogue Knight has unique dialogue in many situations - keep an eye out! [*]The Rogue Knight will not travel with other Rogue Knights. [/list]
